Sea dragons' affinity with water grants them mastery over rain, storms, and floods. Those whose livelihoods are at the mercy of the weather and waves frequently venerate these great aquatic creatures. Most sea dragons respond kindly to requests, but, like the sea, they can be unpredictable and fickle. Sea dragons have disk-shaped scales like fish and webbed claws as well as large back and tail fins to aid in swimming. They appear in vivid and vibrant colors, like aquatic wildlife. Underwater flora and fauna grow and thrive upon older sea dragons, and ancient sea dragons often have a head of coral around their antlers, giving them the image of being crowned royalty. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Adult Sea Dragon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1126) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 78 **Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [wavesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=41) (imprecise) 60 feet **Languages** [Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14), [Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +18, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +26, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +22, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +20 **Str** +6 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 --- **AC** 33 fed by metal **Fort** +22 **Ref** +25 **Will** +20 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 225 **Immunities** [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Countered by Earth** If the sea dragon is targeted with an [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55) spell or [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123), they lose Liquefy until the end of their next turn.
**Fed by Metal** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) When a sea dragon is struck by a weapon made primarily of metal or affected by a spell that uses metal, many of the dragon's scales transform to mimic the metal. This grants the dragon a +1 item bonus to AC until the start of their next turn.
**[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** (aura, emotion, fear, mental) 90 feet, DC 30
**Vortex** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) 40 feet. Water in the aura that's also in the same body of water as the dragon is difficult terrain for [Swimming](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) creatures which don't have the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait.
**Liquefy** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) **Trigger** The dragon is targeted by a Strike or spell that could deal fire or physical damage to them; **Effect** The dragon liquefies, turning entirely to water while maintaining their shape, for a split second. Against the triggering effect, they gain resistance 20 to fire and to all physical damage. --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 100 feet, swim 50 feet; [_water walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=371) **Melee** jaws +26 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+12 piercing plus hyponatremia **Melee** claw +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+12 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** tail +26 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+12 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 32 - **2nd** [Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53) (at will), [Endure Elements](/Spells.aspx?ID=99) (self only) - **Constant (2nd)** [Water Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=371) **Rituals** DC 32 - **8th** [Control Weather](/Rituals.aspx?ID=9) (doesn't require secondary casters) **Breath Weapon** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) The dragon shoots a ball of water that deals 13d6 bludgeoning damage in a 25-foot burst within 50 feet (DC 32 basic Reflex save). All non-magical fire in the radius is extinguished. The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Coiling Frenzy** The dragon makes one claw Strike and one tail Strike in either order, each against the same target. If either Strike hits, the dragon automatically [Grabs](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) the target. **Draconic Momentum** The dragon recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike. **[Greater Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=19)** 3d8+6 bludgeoning, DC 30 **Hyponatremia** ([Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) A living creature that takes damage from the sea dragon's jaws Strike must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) as a surge of excess water floods its body.
